body_html:
I don't believe we have any immediate plans for working on this, so I'm going to mark this as Contributions Welcome, with the expectation that this might be updated as things towards #5039 happen.

If anyone does want to assist with this, it may make sense to discuss some design here before investing too much time in implementation.

Thanks!

body:
I don't believe we have any immediate plans for working on this, so I'm going to mark this as Contributions Welcome, with the expectation that this might be updated as things towards #5039 happen.

If anyone does want to assist with this, it may make sense to discuss some design here before investing too much time in implementation.

Thanks!
